messages.message: Hello team. One suggestion for improvement. The validation prompts do not allow us to type accented characters in their description. In some cases they may be important to describe the validation rule, as accented characters change the meaning of the words.
@Serena is this a natural extension of https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-1330? It feels like a similar requirement.
@fernando.piazza.ctr will make a ticket here. We should try to pick this up
Serena is OOO but I agree this seems similar to the previous change for field names
